at grub menu keyboard not working: ive had some machines not work with grub with a USB keyboard. but did work with a Ps2 keyboard. a few were fixed by the 'legacy-usb' setting in teh bios
:)  i had a little ps2 hooked to my old pc ages ago untill i saw that setting. However I DID have issues with windoes with that setting enavled.. so watch out
